{"blocks":[{"key":"9m5om","text":"Before the end of the blocking step, prepare the solution with the primary antibody ChAT","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bumop","text":"blocking solution (TBST+10% DS) + Goat Anti-Chat Ab  dilution 1:200.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
